description: Automatic clustering of orthologs and in-paralogs from pairwise species comparisons. This program package detects complex orthologous relationships between the protein sequences from different genomes. It uses BLAST scores to measure relatedness of proteins
publications: Remm,M., Storm, C. and E. Sonnhammer (2001).  Automatic Clustering of Orthologs and In-paralogs from Pairwise Species Comparisons.  J.Mol.Biol. 314:1041-1052
O'Brien Kevin P, Remm Maido and Sonnhammer Erik L.L (2005).  Inparanoid: A Comprehensive Database of Eukaryotic Orthologs NAR 33:D476-D480
Berglund AC, Sjölund E, Ostlund G, Sonnhammer ELL (2008) InParanoid 6: eukaryotic ortholog clusters with inparalogs" Nucleic Acids Res. 36:D263-266
name: inparanoid
